import { Card, CardGrid, Aside } from '@astrojs/starlight/components';

# Theme System Overview

ND_BehaviorTree supports a flexible theme system that lets you customize the appearance of your behavior tree editor and nodes. With themes, you can match your workflow, improve clarity, or simply make your tools look great.

<CardGrid>
  <Card title="Apply Theme" icon="palette">
    Learn how to apply built-in or custom themes to the editor for a personalized experience.
  </Card>
  <Card title="Customization" icon="settings">
    Discover options for fine-tuning colors, fonts, and UI elements to fit your project's needs.
  </Card>
  <Card title="Individual Node Theme" icon="node">
    Style specific nodes for better visual organization and quick identification.
  </Card>
</CardGrid>

<Aside type="note">
Themes help you work faster and more comfortably by making your editor visually clear and tailored to your preferences.
</Aside>
